# Ley mortalidad Makeham Beard --------------------------
muxt.mb = function(t,x,pars){
a = pars[1]; b = pars[2]; C=pars[3]; k =pars[4];
C+( a*exp(b*(x+t)) )/( 1 + k*a*exp(b*(x+t)) )
}
tpx.mb = function(t,x,pars){
a = pars[1]; b = pars[2]; C=pars[3]; k =pars[4];
exp(C*
t)*( (exp(b*
x) + a*k )/( exp(b*
x)+ a*k*exp(b*t)))^(1/(k*b))
}
